20898.「任務の報告に 参上いたしました。: I am here to report on my mission.

20899.「魔法戦士ベスコーと グリーダの両名は\n ガートラント王国での 魔物討伐任務を:
The armamentalist warriors Besuko and Gurida have just returned home after completing their mission to defeat monsters in the Kingdom of
Gartlant.

20900.「フッ……ご苦労だった！\n ふたりには あらためて 任務が与えられる。:
Well done! The two of you will be given a new
assignment.

20901.「ユナティ！ 後は まかせるぞ。: Yunaty! I'll leave the rest to you.

20902.「貴公は しばし ここで待機してくれ。: You will wait here for a while.

20903.「任務完了の報は 聞いた。\n 次の任務を ふたりに伝えよう。:
I heard the news that your mission is
complete. I'll tell them about the next
mission.

20904.「ベスコー殿は ドワチャッカ大陸の\n ドルワーム水晶宮へ 向かってほしい。\n:
Lord Besuko, please proceed to Dolworm Crystal
Palace in Dwachakka Continent. The Royal
Knights have requested our assistance.

20905.「グリーダ殿は オーグリード大陸へ飛び\n グレン城の武器鍛冶ギルドへ 向かえ。:
Lord Gurida, you are to fly to Ogreed Continent and proceed to the Weaponsmith Guild at Glen Castle. You have been asked to escort
an important person. That is all.

20906.「謹んで 受理いたします。\n ベスコー及び グリーダの両名は\n ただちに 任:
I respectfully accept. Both Mr. Besuko and Ms.
Gurida will depart for their assignments
immediately.

20907.「見ていたな <pc>？\n 我々は 各国からの要請に応じて 任務を帯び\n 世:
Did you see that, <pc>? We are sent
around the world on missions as requested by
our respective countries.

20908.「女王ディオーレ様の恵みのお心は\n ウェナ諸島を越え 世界へ向けられている。\:
Queen Diore's gracious heart goes beyond the Wena Islands to the world. We, the Armamentalist Corps, are the embodiment of
that grace.

20909.「ゆえに 魔法戦士となる者には\n 我が国の代表に ふさわしい\n 容姿と礼節が:
Therefore, those who will become armamentalists must be worthy of the appearance and decorum of our nation's
representatives.

20910.「ふむ……。貴公は 容姿に関しては\n まあ 問題なしと言っていいだろう。\n:
Hmm...as far as your appearance, I suppose
it's acceptable. You can learn proper
etiquette as you go.

20911.「では 貴公へ 試験の内容を伝えよう。\n これは試験だが すでに魔法戦士の\n:
Now, my dear sir, I will tell you what the test is. It is a test, but you may already accept it as the first assignment of an
armamentalist.

20912.「貴公はこれより ヴェリナード領南にいる\n <%sEV_QUE_NAME0>を:
You are now to take out <%dEV_QUE_T_NUM0> Seaslimes in
Verinard South after using Wizard Ward once!

20913.「このとき その戦闘に\n 勝利する必要があることを 忘れてはならない。\n 逃:
Remember, you must win the battle. If you run
away or lose, you don't count.

20914.「これは 魔法戦士の素養を見るための\n 伝統的な試験と なっているのだ。\n:
This has become the traditional test to see if
you are an armamentalist. Are you ready to
take it?

20915.「よし。ならば すぐに出発せよ。\n 魔法戦士は 任務を受けた瞬間から\n その:
All right. Then leave now. From the moment an
armamentalist receives a mission, he must work
to complete it.

20916.「そして 与えられた任務を誇りとし\n 完了に向けて 全身全霊を傾けるのだ。:
And you must be proud of the task you have
been given and devote yourself to its
completion.

20917.「……いや 待て。\n 貴公は すでに 多くの任務を抱えているな。:
No, wait. No, wait. You already have too many
missions.

20918.「多くの任務を 同時に進めるというのは\n 魔法戦士には ふさわしくない やり方:
It is not the way of an armamentalist to have
so many missions going on at the same time.
You should go finish your other duties.

20919.「……そうか 残念なことだ。\n この任務を果たす自信がないというなら\n しか:
Well, that's unfortunate. If you don't have
the confidence to fulfill this mission, then
so be it.

20920.「自分を信じることが できぬ者は\n 魔法戦士の素養なしと 心得よ。:
Those who cannot believe in themselves have no
qualities of an armamentalist.
